title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the percent employed in agriculture declined in both regions during this time period.

Two points for comparing the rate or level of the decline in employment in agriculture in both regions during this time period.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following comparisons of the trend lines:
The response correctly states the following comparison of the trend lines:
The response correctly compares the following trend lines:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that rural to urban migration increased in East Asia and the Pacific.

Two points for explaining the relationship between rural to urban migration and a decline in agricultural employment.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which internal migration patterns have affected agricultural employment:
The response correctly states one of the following degrees to which internal migration patterns have affected agricultural employment:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which internal migration patterns have affected agricultural employment:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the graph does not provide any direct information about the mechanization of agriculture.

Two points for explaining that the graph does not provide any direct information about the process or processes that led to declines in employment in agriculture.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following limitations of the data:
The response correctly states the following limitation of the data:
The response correctly explains the following limitation of data:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating an example of how declining overall employment in agriculture may affect women in society.

Two points for explaining the relationship between declining overall employment in agriculture, improved educational opportunities for women, and changes in womenâ€™s roles in society.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how one of the following changes may affect the roles of women in society:
The response correctly states one of the following changes that may affect the roles of women in society:
The response correctly explains one of the following changes that may affect the roles of women in society:
